bug.author: akki6843
bug.description:
Hello, I am trying to access the lane_type info for the lane which is on right hand side of the ego_vehicle. And I am getting following results:
current lane is driving first right lane is parking second right lane is sidewalk
But if we look at below image there is no parking lane. Is this expected? <denchmark-code> _current_lane_info = self.ego_vehicle.get_world().get_map().get_waypoint(self.ego_vehicle.get_location()) print(_current_lane_info.lane_type) if(str(_current_lane_info.lane_type) == 'Driving'): _new_lane = _current_lane_info.get_right_lane() while(True): print(self._num_lane_changes, _new_lane.lane_type) if((str(_new_lane.lane_type) == 'Driving') or (str(_new_lane.lane_type) == 'Parking')): _new_lane = _new_lane.get_right_lane() self._num_lane_changes += 1 else: break else: _new_lane = _current_lane_info </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16385631/55480258-7c4e2280-563d-11e9-892d-29f28d0334a7.png></denchmark-link>
OS : Linux 18.04 python : 3.5 build : Nightly build

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/akki6843>@akki6843</denchmark-link> , There is an unmarked parking lane there. We working with that.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/XGodina>@XGodina</denchmark-link> , I think there is some issue for maps on 0.9.4? No matter where the vehicle is, the lane type attached to its waypoint is always "driving". I checked the opendrive .xodr file, I think the lane type definition inside is right. So I believe there is something wrong with the lane id annotation for the carla map.
